about.title: About me
about.description: With more than 4 years of experience in web development following a professional reconversion, I can now offer my services as a Full stack web developer. Reliable and able to work independently as well as in a team, I have a good capacity of analysis and a real initiative in the resolution of problems. My adaptability allows me to work in a team and to answer your web challenges, whether they are mono-product or multi-product in Agile / Scrum mode.

services.title: Skills
services.app-web-content: Creation of business applications, Intranet, Extranet, Corporate and showcase sites, Web apps...
services.responsive-content: Use of HTML5 / CSS3 technologies to create adaptive designs. Use of Bootstrap / Material UI frameworks to facilitate implementation and increase productivity
services.architecture-content: MVC design pattern to separate the layers and avoid "spaghetti" code. Object oriented programming / PDO for MySQL / AJAX / Jquery / Javascript / WebService RestFul JSON ...
services.code-content: To facilitate its recovery and maintainability. My priorities: KISS / DRY. Contribution to the writing of simple technical documentation.
services.seo-accessibility-content: Use of Google Analytics / Adsense / Adwords / Tanaguru tools. Application of SEO and digital accessibility rules and best practices.
services.team-content: Know how to listen, exchange and help each other to progress together (Scrum, Jira, Git, GitLab, Confluence...).
